alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 1:55PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Elmore and south central Tallapoosa Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 155 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Santuck, or 8 miles northeast of Wetumpka, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wetumpka, Tallassee, Eclectic, Martin Dam, Santuck, Dexter, Tallapoosa City, Claud, Yates Dam, Reeltown and Yates Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
